EmailTemplate.name: Ds Team Approval Template For Client
EmailTemplate.subject: Approval Request for Client Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear DS Team,
You are requested to approve the request for Client Review for {!Account.Name}.
Please click on the following link to access the request on LinKreta, {!ApprovalRequest.Internal_URL}
Note:- This is a system generated email. Please do not reply to this mail.
